meanings.definition: To abstain completely from alcoholic drinks.
meanings.sent1: After his doctor's advice, John teetotaled to improve his health.
meanings.sent2: She decided to teetotal for a month as a personal challenge.
meanings.sent3: The party was so wild that even the bartender teetotaled for the night!
meanings.sent4: His commitment to teetotaling was as strong as a steel chain.
meanings.sent5: The decision to teetotal was like turning a new leaf in his life.

meanings.sent1: Since college, she has teetotaled and never touched alcohol.
meanings.sent2: He proudly teetotaled and encouraged others to do the same.
meanings.sent3: The teetotaling club welcomed anyone who wanted to join their alcohol-free lifestyle.
meanings.sent4: In a world of drinkers, he stood out as a teetotaling beacon.
meanings.sent5: Her dedication to teetotaling was unwavering, like a lighthouse in a storm.
